summary: Beautiful, detached, laconic, consumptive Lily Brest is a streetwalker with few clients. She loves her idle boyfriend Raoul who gambles away what little she earns. The town's power broker, ... See full summary »
cast: Ingrid Caven|Rainer Werner Fassbinder|Annemarie Düringer|Adrian Hoven|Boy Gobert|Ulli Lommel|Jean-Claude Dreyfus|Irm Hermann|Debria Kalpataru|Hans Gratzer|Peter Chatel|Ila von Hasperg|Gail Curtis|Christine Jirku|Raúl Gimenez|Alexander Allerson|Harry Baer|Klaus Löwitsch
title: La sombra de los ángeles
